kb3.name: kb3_api_keys
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_api_keys` ( `key_name` VARCHAR( 50 ) NOT NULL, `key_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `key_key` VARCHAR( 64 ) NOT NULL, `key_kbsite` VARCHAR( 16 ) NOT NULL, `key_flags` TINYINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`key_name`, `key_id`, `key_key`, `key_kbsite`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
